answers.answer: I actually liked the taste of it from my last pregnancy

question: Once again I couldn't keep that nasty drink down for 3 hr, I didn't even make it pass 30 minutes. I also refuses to take the test again because I am not going to drink that nasty drink again just to throw it up again.
title: throw it up again
